import React from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import "./Todoform.css" import {onSubmit, LableChange} from "../../redusers/todoformReduser" import { addTodoItem } from "../../redusers/todoitems" function TodoForm() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const lable = useSelector((state) => state.todoform.lable); const onSubmit = (e) =>{ dispatch(addTodoItem(e.target.value)) console.log("onSubmit") } const onLableChange = (e) => { dispatch(LableChange(e.target.value)) console.log(e.target.value) } return (

Todos

) } export default TodoForm
